examples.example: 我们每个月都会开会一起探讨工作中遇到的问题和分享好的经验。

translate.english: Every month we will have a meeting to discuss the problems encountered in the work and share good experience together.

examples.example: 领导们常常开会商量如何更好地推动项目进展。

translate.english: Leaders often hold meetings to discuss how to better promote the progress of the project.

examples.example: 大家开开心心地聚在一起开会，讨论怎样让团队更加出色。

translate.english: Everyone happily gets together to hold a meeting and discuss how to make the team more outstanding.
